meanings.definition: A restaurant where pizzas are made and sold.
meanings.sent1: We went to the pizzeria for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The pizzeria down the street makes the best pepperoni pizza.
meanings.sent3: The pizzeria had a special deal on pizzas shaped like animals.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a pizzeria of joy, spreading warmth to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the pizzeria drew us in from blocks away.

meanings.definition: The business of making and selling pizzas.
meanings.sent1: He decided to start his own pizzeria after years of working in the food industry.
meanings.sent2: The pizzeria industry is competitive but rewarding.
meanings.sent3: The pizzeria business boomed during the holiday season.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a pizzeria of ideas, constantly churning out new concepts.
meanings.sent5: The success of his pizzeria was a testament to his hard work and dedication.
